string.text: Three-piece sharpening stone set

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for knives and blades
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Blunt knives and tools? It doesn't have to be that way. Super-practical 3 piece grindstone set for everyone, packed in a nice polyester bag. No more loose grindstone, sliding about in drawers, scratching everything - no, everything is now in its place. For perfect sharpening, three important grains for pre-grinding, sharpening and for the subsequent stripping of the blade are integrated in the set, so you can achieve a razor-sharp cutting edge.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] economical
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] useful for repairing knives and certain tools
"Brunox Gun Care" spray lubricant

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for all weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Spray can containing oil intended for lubricating and protecting firearms. Application will help prevent guns from malfunctioning and corroding after prolonged use in combat situations. Prior to lubrication, it is advisable to make use of basic tools to access the inner parts of a gun in order to maximize the effectiveness of the spray. Before use be sure to properly clean the firearm to remove any foreign material that has accumulated on or inside it. A proprietary "Tuboline" additive increases gliding quality of all movable parts making the oil even better suited for precision repeaters and automatic weapons. This Swiss formula allows guns to function at temperatures of as low as -55 °C. It has a flash point of 78 °C.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] sprayable gun preservative
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for maintaining firearms
"Dvojka" cleaning solvent and gun oil

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for all weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Iconic Red Army oil that has been in service for almost 70 years. The metal bottle is divided into two separate compartments, one for oil and the other one for the cleaning solvent. In the beginning, the solvent was based on an alkaline solution for effective clean-up of salts from corrosive Berdan primers. Since then, the composition of liquids has been modernized, but the simple yet ingenious 'double' bottle design remained unchanged. "Dvojka" is very popular in the Exclusion Zone due to its reliability in the field. Bear in mind, the solvent works best when spread with a cloth so it can evenly coat a weapon's inner mechanisms.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] liquid gun cleaning solvent and oil
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for maintaining firearms
"Rusak" mineral oil

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for all weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Plastic bottle containing a budget Russian mineral oil suited for regular maintenance of knives and guns. Despite its low quality nature, it can prove useful in keeping a firearm in a good condition if applied frequently and carefully using a good cloth. According to the manufacturer, "Rusak" is especially effective for automatic and repeatable weapons due to low friction coefficient. It is advertised as containing various anti-corrosion and metal-preserving additives, but it is just ordinary mineral oil.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] liquid gun oil
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for maintaining firearms
Hoppe's "No. 9" gun cleaner with oil

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] suited for all weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Western made, high-quality firearm cleaning solvent especially adapted for use in harsh environmental conditions, "Hoppe's No. 9" remains the cleaning solution of choice for Zone dwellers who can afford it. Like all solvents, it removes rust, powder, and lead fouling. Substance acts quickly, is super-efficient, safe and easy to use. Comes with an additional bottle of Hoppe's No. 9 Lubricating Oil to prevent clean metal surfaces from rusting again. Although it is designed to flow freely and penetrate rapidly, it is still advisable to use cleaning tools or fabrics to ensure good coverage.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] liquid gun cleaning solvent and oil
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing and maintaining firearms
"Progress" handgun cleaning kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9mm, .45 and .357 caliber weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]A set of specialized brushes which can be used to clean the barrel and other parts of a firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, lubricant residues and other foreign materials that have accumulated during use. Such sets are quite commonly used in the Zone in order to keep firearms in a good shape at all times. It is possible to utilize common tools to have a better access to inner mechanisms of a gun or alcohol to more easily dissolve oil residue. Can also be used to better spread gun oil, however a more cost-efficient method used by most experienced stalkers entails the application of animal fat on the brushes as an alternative lubricant. This particular set fits typical handgun calibers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for maintaining handguns
"Aurora A108/12" 12ga bore cleaning kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 12ga weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]A set of specialized brushes which can be used to clean the barrel and other parts of a firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, lubricant residues and other foreign materials that have accumulated during use. It is possible to utilize common tools to have a better access to inner mechanisms of a gun or alcohol to more easily dissolve oil residue. This particular set fits 12ga shotguns. "Aurora" kit comes with three specialized brush types, one for respectively after-fire cleaning, lubricant spreading and rust removal. Will keep your favorite shotgun in good shape at all times.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for maintaining shotguns
"ValuPro III" smallbore rifle cleaning kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.45 and 5.56 caliber weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]A set of specialized brushes which can be used to clean the barrel and other parts of a firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, lubricant residues and other foreign materials that have accumulated during use. Such sets are quite commonly used in the Zone in order to keep firearms in a good shape at all times. It is possible to utilize common tools to have a better access to inner mechanisms of a gun or alcohol to more easily dissolve oil residue. Can also be used to better spread gun oil, however a more cost-efficient method used by most experienced stalkers entails the application of animal fat on the brushes as an alternative lubricant. This particular pack fits medium-caliber rifles with long barrels and comes in a hard plastic reusable container.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for maintaining small bore rifles
Medium and large caliber rifle cleaning kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7.62, 7.92, 9x39 and .338 caliber weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]A set of specialized brushes which can be used to clean the barrel and other parts of a firearm from dirt, sand, moisture, lubricant residues and other foreign materials that have accumulated during use. Such sets are quite commonly used in the Zone in order to keep firearms in a good shape at all times. It is possible to utilize common tools to have a better access to inner mechanisms of a gun or alcohol to more easily dissolve oil residue. Can also be used to better spread gun oil, however a more cost-efficient method used by most experienced stalkers entails the application of animal fat on the brushes as an alternative lubricant. This particular set fits large-caliber rifles and very long barrels. Manufacturer unknown, but its simple design and construction as well as very high quality materials used suggest a military, presumably special forces origin.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for maintaining large bore rifles
Universal heavy duty maintenance kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Advanced gun cleaning kit fitting all common weapon calibers. Along with cleaning and maintenance, it is also useful as an effective tool for small repair tasks. The set comprises small portions of high strength cleaners and abrasive compounds as well as some light tools to facilitate access to inner mechanisms of a firearm. Included are additional small patching materials and sets of small screws, pins, and springs for restoring lost or missing components. It is strongly recommended to use a solvent and preservative during or after repair to improve the condition of fine components which are not usually taken apart for cleaning.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing firearms
Handgun repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9mm, .45 and .357 caliber weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This kit comes with a standard set of elementary firearm spare parts. It also has standard oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and specialized tools used for disassembly and maintenance of mechanisms of weapons. The kit is quite heavy, but is irreplaceable when venturing deep into the Zone as it can be used in life-or-death situations to make a firearm usable again. Due to differences in weapon construction this particular set can only be used for disassembly and repair of weapons with handgun calibers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing handguns
Shotgun fixing kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 12ga weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This kit comes with a standard set of elementary firearm spare parts. It also has standard oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and specialized tools used for disassembly and maintenance of mechanisms of weapons. The kit is quite heavy, but is irreplaceable when venturing deep into the Zone as it can be used in life-or-death situations to make a firearm usable again. Due to differences in weapon construction this particular set can only be used for disassembly and repair of weapons with shotgun calibers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing shotguns
Smallbore rifle repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.45 and 5.56 caliber weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This kit comes with a standard set of elementary firearm spare parts. It also has standard oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and specialized tools used for disassembly and maintenance of mechanisms of weapons. The kit is quite heavy, but is irreplaceable when venturing deep into the Zone as it can be used in life-or-death situations to make a firearm usable again. Due to differences in weapon construction this particular set can only be used for disassembly and repair of small-to-medium size rifles.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing small bore rifles
Large caliber rifle repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] 7.62, 7.92, 9x39 and .338 caliber weapons
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This kit comes with a standard set of elementary firearm spare parts. It also has standard oils, solvents, basic cleaning equipment and specialized tools used for disassembly and maintenance of mechanisms of weapons. The kit is quite heavy, but is irreplaceable when venturing deep into the Zone as it can be used in life-or-death situations to make a firearm usable again. Due to differences in weapon construction this particular set can only be used for disassembly and repair of medium-to-large size rifles.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing large bore rifles
Handgun repair kit (empty box)

Empty metal box which previously contained tools and spare parts usable for maintaining 9mm, .45 and .357 caliber firearms. Even in its current state it can prove useful in repairing metal parts of outfits. A low-value trading commodity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Shotgun fixing kit (empty box)

Empty metal box which previously contained tools and spare parts usable for maintaining 12ga caliber firearms. Even in its current state it can prove useful in repairing metal parts of outfits. A low-value trading commodity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Smallbore rifle repair kit (empty box)

Empty metal box which previously contained tools and spare parts usable for maintaining 5.45 and 5.56 caliber firearms. Even in its current state it can prove useful in repairing metal parts of outfits. A low-value trading commodity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Large caliber rifle repair kit (empty box)

Empty metal box which previously contained tools and spare parts usable for maintaining large caliber firearms. Even in its current state it can prove useful in repairing metal parts of outfits. A low-value trading commodity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
Basic sewing kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]A sewing kit consisting of a cloth reel, several steel needles and a pair of scissors. It can be used to sew up bullet holes or ruptures in soft fabrics of outfits. Its practical applications are limited due to the ordinary thread and needles, so the kit will be useless in case of more serious damage to thicker armor components. For the same reason, it's compatible with only a handful of materials. Nonetheless, it is strongly advised to always use whatever is available to make the kit more effective.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing light helmets, medium and light armors
Advanced patching kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This advanced set contains more and better accessories for working with armor than its basic counterpart. Double reels of nylon thread and a large selection of higher-quality needles make it suitable for working on thicker and harder textiles and leathers, including artificial fibers amd mutant skins. It contains a staple gun and a crimping tool to stitch together armor that has literally been torn apart.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing helmets, heavy and lighter armors
Heavy smithing kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This military-grade kit is designed to handle fractures in protective plates of modern combat armors and weld together breakages in metal structures on exosuits using the small included torch, and is capable of sewing even hardest of mutant hides over your armor of choice thanks to a set of leather punches and a small hammer and a reel of polymerized steel cable. It's also got a set of pry bars and precision screwdrivers that can be used to disassemble outfits and headgear for repair. It's the most comprehensive armor repair kit available in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing helmets, exoskeletal and lighter armors
"Zviezda" glue tube

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Cheapest of the synthetic adhesives available in the Zone, this cyanoacrylate-based solution may be used to put together slightly torn pieces of fabric or to patch up a small hole in your helmet, but it will be useless in case of any serious damage. On the other hand, "Zviezda" has a great value for price, and if used on a regular basis it's able to keep your outfit in a good shape at all times. It is advised to use any materials on hand to greatly increase effectiveness of repair. The glue, however, can't effectively permeate thick fabric patches such as kevlar. Can also be used to facilitate sewing.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing and maintaining apparel
"Tur" glue tube

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]Advanced glue produced by the Ukrainian chemical industry, modified polyurethane-based adhesive "Tur" is able to quickly bind most solid materials. Versatility and ease of use are the two reasons why "Tur" is kept in such a high regard among stalkers, especially since spare materials are scarce. The glue binds both light textiles and heavier protective fabric patches like kevlar with little effort, but is not strong enough to be useful when it comes to bonding metals.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing and maintaining apparel
"M17" glue tube

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]M17 is a result of a Soviet military-industrial research project intended to devise an extremely potent, two-component adhesive which could be used in any situation regardless of purpose and materials involved. It was decided to use a highly potent epoxy which is most often optimized for reacting with either plastic or metal. In case of M17, however, this limitation has been bypassed, making the substance equally effective in both areas. In addition, the adhesive received a significant boost to versatility thanks to its hydrate form: it can be diluted with water and used in any concentration depending on the intended result. Thanks to the lack of solvents this glue can work safely and effectively on any material. Usable with any patch materials available in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing and maintaining apparel
Emergency armor field repair set

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and light headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]A repair set allowing the user to perform short notice repairs of outfits and bodyarmor. Includes military grade double sided adhesive tape and ready-to-use sheets of ballistic nylon in a variety of shapes and sizes which make it possible to quickly patch up any damage. This is especially useful to prevent further structural damage of compromised suits. Due to the inclusion of fiberglass sheets and fast curing epoxy resin the kit is still effective for repairing harder materials like kevlar and metal in a hurry.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (adhesive tape)
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for maintaining helmets, heavy and lighter armors
Headgear repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] medium and heavy headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This kit contains everything that is needed to perform effective repair of modern combat helmets. It features heavy tools that will allow you to work on hard materials such as kevlar, steel or titanium, as well as a very strong, methacrylate-based adhesive. As the kit does not contain any sewing equipment, it cannot be effectively utilized for reparation of flexible materials of armors, but it can be used to disassemble headgear sets to greatly improve the effectiveness of repair.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing headwear
Heavy outfit repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] all outfits and headgear sets
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary - from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches - to conduct a complete repair of any armor or headgear. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth, military-grade kevlar sheets, or heavy mutant pelts. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing heavy armors
Light armor repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] very light and light armors
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary - from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches - to conduct a complete repair of any light armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] used for repairing light armors
Medium armor repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] medium armors
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary - from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches - to conduct a complete repair of any medium armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] used for repairing medium armors
Heavy armor repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] heavy armours
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary - from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches - to conduct a complete repair of any heavy armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] used for repairing heavy armors
Exoskeleton repair kit

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] any exoskeleton
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]This complex and heavy set includes everything necessary - from ultra-durable threads and needles to polymer-based patches - to conduct a complete repair of any hi-tech armor. Can be used regardless of materials involved, be it heavy cloth or military-grade kevlar sheets. Additional tools and kits increase effectiveness of repairs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing exoskeletal armors
Multitool

A multifunction tool helpful for disassembly of weapons and armor, and for maintainance of worn and rusty trigger mechanisms.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] all-purpose disassembling tool
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for weapon trigger group maintenance
File

A metal file used to restore weapon parts such as a worn or rusty breech head, bolt, or gas tube.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for weapon barrel and breech maintenance
Ramrod

An old ramrod consisting of three composite wooden rods, used to restore parts such as worn or rusty barrels and gas tubes.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] toolkit
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for weapon barrel and gas tube maintenance
Basic sewing thread

This sewing thread is made out of many different fabrics including cotton, linen, nylon, and silk. Every stalker knows it's not easy to avoid cloth tearing every now and then due to the harsh environments inside the Zone. Saving a couple of sewing threads for long trips is a wise idea.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for repairing armor components
Field armour toolkit

An advanced toolkit for sewing ballistic materials and sealing retardants. Includes kevlar thread, one of the strongest and most heat resistant commercially available threads. It is about 2.5 times stronger than nylon and polyester, has very little stretch, does not melt, and decomposes at 800F. This makes it a great choice for high stress applications including sewing seams on heavy duty clothing.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
